definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Last year he took his administrative staff on a holiday to Phuket.
sentences.chinese: 去年，他安排企業行政人員去普吉島休假。

sentences.english: Patong Beach in Phuket, Thailand. Patong Beach in Phuket, Thailand is the most famous beach in Phuket.
sentences.chinese: 泰國的芭東海灘是普吉島上最著名的海灘。

sentences.english: My first job was teaching at a Tourism College on the island of Phuket.
sentences.chinese: 我的第一份工作是在普吉島的一個旅遊學院教書。

sentences.english: At late afternoon we got picked up by the Speedboat again to head back to Phuket Island.
sentences.chinese: 下午的晚些時候我們又一次乘快艇回到了普吉島。

sentences.english: Firecrackers burst around celebrants at the Vegetarian Festival in Phuket, Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 泰國普吉島的素食節上，爆竹在人們的身邊爆炸。

sentences.english: I will stay at Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket.
sentences.chinese: 我將住在普吉島森塔拉海灘度假酒店飯店。
我們去普吉島玩滑翔傘。

sentences.english: Welcome to the new Courtyard by Marriott Phuket at Surin Beach Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到位於普吉島蘇林海灘的萬豪庭院酒店。

sentences.english: Do you want to know more about our trip to Phuket with DYT?
sentences.chinese: 想知道我們與戴陽天在普吉島上旅遊的點點滴滴嗎？

sentences.english: Choosing just one beach on Phuket proved to be a tad difficult.
sentences.chinese: 要在普吉只選一個沙灘那可真有點困難。

definition: Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
Kota Kinabalu (capital of Sabah state, Malaysia)
Sabah, state of Malaysia in north Borneo 婆羅洲|婆罗洲
Cebu, a province (and a city) in the Philippines (Tw)
Fiji, country in the southwest Pacific Ocean
